org.corfudb.universe.scenario

Class Scenario.ScenarioTestCase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.universe.scenario.Scenario.ScenarioTestCase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - input data
    Enclosing class:
    Scenario<D,T extends Fixture<D>>

    public static class Scenario.ScenarioTestCase<T>
extends Object
    ScenarioTestCase is a ScenarioTest-s factory, represents a group of tests. It provides api for creating new tests
